message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. I'm willing to give you 400k, but I'm hoping we can do better than that.
I'll give you a better offer. You can't do better than this!
I'm not convinced that's the best you can do, Bob. I'm hoping for a better offer.
I'm willing to compromise, Bob. I'll give you a bit more, but I'm still hoping for a better split.
I'm not budging, Alice. This is my final offer. Take it or leave it!
Alright, Bob, I'll take it. But I'm not happy about it.
